aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.desc:
We are a team of professionals in web development and innovation, ready to turn your concepts into successful and profitable projects. Since late 2021, we have already implemented over 75 successful websites, demonstrating our high level of expertise and professionalism.
Our approach is based on individual attention to each client, ensuring the development of modern, productive, and unique web solutions. We thoroughly consider the latest trends and industry requirements to provide your project with a competitive edge.

1.desc: At this stage, the main focus is on understanding the project goals, target audience, and requirements. This involves gathering information through meetings, discussions, and research. The project scope is determined, and a strategy is developed to ensure the website aligns with its intended purpose. Key deliverables include project concept, user personas, site map, competitor analysis, recommendations, forecasting, and evaluation.

2.desc: At this stage, the main focus is on creating the visual appearance and user interface of the website. Designers determine the color palette, fonts, layouts, and page structure. Important aspects of user experience are also taken into account, ensuring convenient navigation and an aesthetically appealing look. Designers consider adaptability and interactivity to optimize user interaction, aiming to create a seamless and engaging browsing experience.

3.desc: At this stage, the main focus is on understanding the unique needs of your business and achieving optimal functionality. Our team of experts is ready to tackle any type of web project, ensuring seamless integration and impactful results for your online presence. Whether creating engaging quiz sites or powerful e-commerce platforms, we prioritize enhancing audience interaction and facilitating efficient commercial processes.

4.desc: At this stage, the main focus is on preparing the website for its public release. This includes uploading content, configuring hosting and domain name settings, performing final checks for errors and security, and ensuring seamless integration. After completing this stage, the site becomes accessible to visitors, providing them with a positive interaction experience, reliable performance, and efficient content management.

5.desc: At this stage, the main focus is on supporting and further developing the website. Administrators and developers monitor the site's performance, fix errors promptly, update content regularly, and enhance functionality according to evolving user needs. Ongoing support also includes optimizing performance, protecting against potential threats to ensure stability, and continuously improving the user experience for sustained success.

checks.title: What will promotion in social networks give you?

1.title: Recognition of the company
1.desc: ЅMM-promotion is definitely not a direction that can be neglected. The presence of the brand in popular social networks can significantly increase the recognition of the company among the target, near-target and even non-target audiences.

2.title: Customer satisfaction and engagement
2.desc: It is easier to attract an audience on social networks than, for example, on a website. Here you can hold contests, quizzes, polls, voting, and more. The reaction of subscribers will be better than if the same activities are carried out on the company's website.

3.title: A deeper understanding of the audience
3.desc: Promotion on social media is a chance to maintain regular touch with the audience, check their emotions, and be interested in their thoughts. This allows you to have a deeper understanding of your audience while also creating a human brand.

4.title: Effective advertising of a new product or service
4.desc: In social networks, it is possible to quickly draw attention to a new product or service. Word of mouth here works just fine! Plus, let's not forget about targeted advertising, which can be very finely tuned to show exactly to your target audience.

5.title: Increase in the conversion rate
5.desc: Online promotion always aims to increase conversions and improve sales, including social media promotion. Various activities and advertising campaigns aimed at multiplying conversion efficiency.

6.title: Increasing brand loyalty
6.desc: Users are more loyal to brands that are not only present in social networks, but also actively communicate, participate in discussions, and contribute to the life of the company and its development strategy.

priceCardsShops.title: Internet-shop
priceCardsShops.desc: We specialize in the development of unique online stores of any level of complexity, as well as typical sites of the low price segment. We are ready to offer the best solution depending on the scale, complexity, budget and terms of your project.

modal.title: Ready-made solutions
modal.desc: At the first stage of creating a business, the choice between ready-made solutions and custom development plays a key role. Ready-made solutions offer quick and easy integration, which significantly saves time and money at the start of a project. They are already optimized to meet core business needs and provide significant benefits in terms of speed of implementation and lower overall costs compared to building a custom solution from scratch.

1.title: Ready-made solutions considered at the start of a business?
1.desc: At the start of a business, off-the-shelf solutions are especially attractive due to their rapid integration and ability to reduce costs. Ready-made solutions help all companies get off to a quick start, avoiding the long process of developing custom solutions from scratch. They provide scalability and flexibility, adapting easily to evolving business needs and market demands.

2.title: What features exist for easy and good development?
2.desc: For effective development of business solutions, it's essential to have an intuitive web interface for users, flexibility in making changes, seamless integration with other systems, and robust data security and user privacy measures in place. These elements ensure smooth operations and enhanced user experience while safeguarding sensitive information.

3.title: Ready-made solutions or custom development?
3.desc: Off-the-shelf solutions offer quicker deployment, eliminate the need for infrastructure setup, reduce development and support expenses, and provide a website ready for immediate use with minimal setup effort and configuration. They streamline the process, enabling businesses to focus more on core operations and less on technical complexities.

1.title: Development of a static website without a server and database?
1.desc: The development of a static website without a server, database is chosen through fast loading of pages and also convenient content management. This approach is ideal for projects where speed and minimization of server resources are important.

2.title: What technologies are available when developing static sites?
2.desc: Basic technologies for creating static sites include HTML for creating structure and content, CSS for styling the appearance of pages, and JavaScript also for adding interactive features (animation or form validation).

3.title: What are the advantages of a static site without a server?
3.desc: Serverless static sites provide fast data loading and improved security by eliminating server-side page generation, thus minimizing operational overhead and resource requirements to a large extent, easily achieving efficiency.

pricelistSeo.title: The cost of promoting the site
pricelistSeo.desc: We have compiled 4 optimal rates for SEO promotion services. For effective work, you can change the set of services individually for each project.

1.title: Plan A
1.subTitle: Promotion of a young site
1.desc: The age of the site directly affects its position in search results. It is very difficult for a young site (from 1 to 8 months) to occupy places on the first page of the issue of profile requests. This is especially true for competitive niches. The package includes standard services provided as part of SEO promotion of the site.
1.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the service 'Plan A - Promotion of a young website' for $500

2.title: Plan B
2.subTitle: Competitiveness of the niche: Low
2.desc: 1.Correcting critical errors on the site is crucial. 2.Promotion of low-frequency requests is essential. 3.Working with up to 5 pages per month is recommended. 4.Writing SEO texts effectively boosts visibility. 5.Placing links on trusted sites is paramount for small business card websites.
2.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the 'Plan B' service for $600

3.title: Plan C
3.subTitle: Competitiveness of the niche: Moderate
3.desc: The package includes standard services provided as part of SEO promotion. As a result of the work performed, you will receive an increase in targeted organic traffic from search engines for selected groups of queries. For whom: corporate sites, service sites, various online stores, product catalogs.
3.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the 'Plan C' service for $800

4.title: Plan D
4.subTitle: Competitiveness of the niche: High
4.desc: Exclusive work on your project. We do not limit ourselves to any limits. To receive an individual offer, leave a request, we will conduct a free audit of the site and determine the list of works that you need. Who it's for: Suitable for any resource that aims to be the most effective sales tool.
4.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the 'Plan D' service for $950

factorsSeo.title: The main factors that affect the final cost of works

1.title: Competition in a similar topic
1.desc: When choosing the most optimal strategies and budgets for SEO promotion of the site, it is also important to take into account the competitive situation in your industry. Analysis of the TOP-10 in search engines such as Yandex or Google entails examining not only competitors but also aggregators, directories, and informational resources.

2.title: Regionality
2.desc: When developing a strategy for your online project, consider that the level of competition in search engines can significantly affect success, potentially requiring a larger budget, especially compared to other Ukrainian cities. Regional variances often necessitate careful financial adaptations for optimal growth strategies to succeed.

3.title: Technical optimization and CMS
3.desc: Our SEO specialists proficiently handle technical optimization for websites utilizing popular CMS systems like WordPress, 1C-Bitrix, Opencart, MODx, Drupal, Magento, PrestaShop, or Joomla, eliminating the need for additional programmer assistance. Also, they ensure seamless optimization across various CMS platforms.

4.title: Number of links and age
4.desc: Effective external links make promotion budget-friendly. New projects need to work on their own strategy to enter the TOP-10 of Google, where the influence of external links plays a significant role. Of course, young projects will need to develop an additional strategy to get into the TOP 10 of Google, which is especially sensitive to external links.

5.title: Number of requests in progress
5.desc: Every 5-10 search requests form a new landing page strategy, on each of which it is necessary to place content, get links, and optimize Title | Description meta-bodies (minimum work front) to ensure maximum visibility, engagement, and organic traffic growth, thereby enhancing overall website performance, relevance, and authority.

checksAds.title: Why does your business need contextual advertising?

1.title: Economic efficiency
1.desc: Unlike other communication channels, contextual advertising has a significantly higher economic effect. Payment is made only for actual clicks on ads, not for mere banner displays on the websites.

2.title: Increase in sales
2.desc: E-commerce sites get the opportunity to attract the attention of potential customers to the selected products, which ultimately leads to substantial growth in their overall sales volume.

3.title: Increasing brand recognition
3.desc: The use of advertising campaigns creates an opportunity to effectively inform a wide range of Internet users about your business, engage with them, captivate their attention, and attract their interest.

4.title: Attracting customers in the service sector
4.desc: Contextually responsive advertising helps identify online audiences interested in your products or services, tailor messaging to their preferences, and bring them to your website.

5.title: Involvement of participants in events
5.desc: Thanks to the quick launch of contextual advertising and high accuracy of settings, you can effectively use this tool to inform people about upcoming events, maximize outreach, and boost attendance rates.

6.title: Interaction with the target audience
6.desc: Display ads effectively reach your target audience using keywords and phrases, ensuring content is accurate, relevant, and timely to interested users, thereby enhancing engagement and conversion rates.

1.title: Technical preparation for work
1.desc: Our company specializes in developing individual strategies for online business promotion. We provide a full range of services, starting with the technical analysis of the site to ensure its optimal functionality and efficiency. We also set up web analytics to ensure the collection and analysis of important traffic and user behavior data.

2.title: Advertising settings
2.desc: We provide a full range of services for setting up advertising campaigns for your business. This involves establishing various marketing initiatives such as search engine campaigns, banner advertisements across media platforms, YouTube video promotions, GSP, Facebook/Instagram ad campaigns, Google Shopping campaigns and of course targeted remarketing efforts.

3.title: Daily monitoring
3.desc: We provide full monitoring of advertising campaigns, including control of the use of daytime LCD, adjustment of the method of displaying ads (standard / accelerated), and the exception of irrelevant requests. We also exclude ineffective sites and YouTube channels, monitor performance indicators, and track user behavior on your site. Our experts constantly analyze data to ensure optimal performance and maximize the results of your advertising strategy.

4.title: Summary of the month
4.desc: We prepare a detailed report on the work performed, which includes the analysis of the results in Google Data Studio. We track key performance indicators and provide a task-by-task retrospective so you can understand how each component impacts your business. After that, we will get in touch with you to jointly make a plan for further actions. Our team uses a brainstorming method to brainstorm new ideas and prioritize tasks.

5.title: Optimization and scaling
5.desc: Our company is engaged in the optimization of advertising campaigns, including testing new hypotheses and scaling the advertising account. We use analytics and A/B testing techniques to improve the performance of your ads and deliver the best results. Our experts actively work on the implementation of innovative strategies and find new opportunities for the growth of your business through Internet advertising.

pricelistAds.title: Types and tools of contextual advertising

1.title: Advertising in Google Adwords
1.desc: Our advertisements provide you with maximum visibility, as they are guaranteed to appear on the first page of the Google search engine when the user enters a thematic query. We offer a quick start of your advertising campaign in 3-5 working days so that you can quickly achieve your marketing goals and attract new customers.
1.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the service 'Advertising in Google Adwords' starting at $70

2.title: Media advertising
2.desc: Your ads are guaranteed to appear on the most popular sites in Ukraine, ensuring your brand wide recognition. Media advertising will allow you to showcase your product face to face, increasing its appeal to the audience. With a low cost per click ($0.01-0.2) and payment only for site conversions, you will be able to effectively manage your budget. Advertising will provide a wide audience reach, helping you attract new and diverse audiences.
2.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the 'Media advertising' service starting at $35

3.title: Retargeting / remarketing
3.desc: Our advertising strategy includes effective remarketing, which allows you to attract the attention of 5% to 25% of potential buyers back to your site. We use this approach to 'catch up' to this audience through advertising on other popular sites. In addition, we can provide remarketing on all major social networks, as well as YouTube, to make the most of the opportunities to reach your target audience and maximize engagement.
3.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the Retargeting service Remarketing' from $20

4.title: Management of contextual advertising
4.desc: For the maximum effectiveness of contextual advertising, we actively collect statistics, test new advertising formats and conduct A/B testing. Our approach is to constantly compare different advertising campaigns, change settings and track results to find out which changes affect the effectiveness of campaigns and key business indicators. This way, we can constantly improve our strategies and achieve the best results for your business.
4.message: Good afternoon, I am writing to you with interest in ordering the service 'Maintenance of contextual advertising' starting at $100 per month

heroBannerSupport.title: Website support
heroBannerSupport.desc: Stable operation of the site means sales, calls and orders from the Internet resource, and as a result, an increase in your profit

1.title: Thoughtful design and interface
1.desc: A professionally designed website not only focuses on aesthetics but also meticulously refines its structure to enhance usability. Thoughtful placement of all elements ensures visitors can easily access essential information, significantly increasing the likelihood of converting visitors into your desired audience or customers. Moreover, intuitive navigation enhances engagement.

2.title: Stable work
2.desc: Ensuring maximum stability for your website is crucial for a thriving online presence. Our uptime guarantee safeguards against technical issues that could disrupt your website's functionality. Consistent reliability prevents potential service interruptions and helps retain customers. We are dedicated to ensuring your visitors consistently have positive interactions with your business.

3.title: Correspondence to user searches
3.desc: Every visitor to your modern website comes to you with a specific purpose. The productivity of your site is to actively achieve this goal, whether through a convenient process of purchasing goods and providing services or quick access to the necessary information. By streamlining user experience, you increase conversion rates, ultimately enhancing overall website performance.

4.title: Regular publication of articles
4.desc: Your site must be actively living its life in order to impress visitors with its live activity and give them the impression of your constant activity. Updating your website with fresh news and interesting articles will not only keep your content relevant, but also have a positive impact on SEO. We will be able to help you with this. Trust the professionals who understand your needs!

5.title: Online promotion of the site
5.desc: Launching a website is just the beginning of success. FullStack - Innovations already at the stage of development of your website very actively focuses on SEO-promotion of the site. Our specialists develop strategies for SEO, contextual advertising and other tools, guaranteeing you stable and growing traffic. Trust us for successful and dynamic online promotion; guaranteed results.

6.title: Active life in social networks
6.desc: According to statistics, every person has his own account in social networks. And it is extremely important that the company page is regularly updated with new and interesting content. This approach ensures visitors understand your business's development, fostering trust and significantly increasing the likelihood of converting visitors into satisfied and loyal clients.

workflow.title: Sequence of work
workflow.desc: The entire work process has a clear plan, which makes it possible to consistently communicate with clients from the initial meeting to handing over the finished project.

1.desc: «We are ready to contact you by phone or accept your application. After this, our specialist will contact you immediately to discuss the details of your project. If you have any further questions, please contact us directly using the provided contact information»

2.desc: «Following these guidelines, we carefully review all the details of your project and ask all the necessary questions to ensure complete understanding. After this, we will definitely agree on everything with you before starting the implementation of your web product»

3.title: Agreement
3.desc: «After creating the technical description, we conclude a legal contract, certifying it in duplicate, and promptly commence the work. If necessary, lawyers can be present during the signing of the contract to ensure legal correctness, clarity, and mutual understanding»

4.title: Demonstration
4.desc: «We present the initial steps and actively modify according to your instructions. Our undeniable advantage is a mandatory weekly presentation of the project progress for your control, discussion, prompt response, feedback, adjustment, and collaboration»

5.title: Submission of work
